titles.title: A resolution celebrating 40 years of achievements of medical coders, and encouraging the medical coding community to continue providing accurate medical claims and statistical reporting to the people of the United States and to the world.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 9/26/2006--Introduced. Recognizes: (1) the historical, clinical, and public health achievements of medical coders in the 40-year history of medical coding; and (2) the great impact that medical coders have on improving the quality of health care.
